example

类 ThumbPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • example.ThumbPanel
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Scrollable

    public class ThumbPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.lang.Runnable, javax.swing.Scrollable, java.awt.image.ImageObserver
    A panel of thumbnails, one for each page of a PDFFile. You can add a PageChangeListener to be informed of when the user clicks one of the pages.
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      (专用程序包) class  ThumbPanel.GotoLater
      Simple runnable to tell listeners that the page has changed.

      • 从类继承的嵌套类/接口 javax.swing.JPanel

        javax.swing.JPanel.AccessibleJPanel

      • 从类继承的嵌套类/接口 javax.swing.JComponent

        javax.swing.JComponent.AccessibleJComponent

      • 从类继承的嵌套类/接口 java.awt.Container

      • 从类继承的嵌套类/接口 java.awt.Component

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      (专用程序包) java.lang.Thread anim
      Thread that renders each thumbnail in turn
      (专用程序包) int border
      Size of the border between images
      (专用程序包) boolean defaultNotSet
      Whether the default width has been guesstimated for this PDFFile yet.
      (专用程序包) int defaultWidth
      Guesstimate of the width of a thumbnail that hasn't been processed yet.
      (专用程序包) PDFFile file
      The PDFFile being displayed
      (专用程序包) java.awt.Image[] images
      Array of images, one per page in the file
      (专用程序包) int lineheight
      Height of each line.
      (专用程序包) PageChangeListener listener
      The PageChangeListener that is listening for page changes
      (专用程序包) int needdrawn
      Which thumbnail needs to be drawn next, or -1 if the previous needy thumbnail is being processed.
      (专用程序包) int showing
      Which thumbnail is selected, or -1 if no thumbnail selected.
      (专用程序包) int[] xloc
      Array of the x locations of each of the thumbnails.

        accessibleContext, listenerList, TOOL_TIP_TEXT_KEY, ui, UNDEFINED_CONDITION, WHEN_ANCESTOR_OF_FOCUSED_COMPONENT, WHEN_FOCUSED, WHEN_IN_FOCUSED_WINDOW

        ABORT, ALLBITS, ERROR, FRAMEBITS, HEIGHT, PROPERTIES, SOMEBITS, WIDTH

    • 字段详细资料

      • file

        PDFFile file
        The PDFFile being displayed

      • images

        java.awt.Image[] images
        Array of images, one per page in the file

      • border

        int border
        Size of the border between images

      • lineheight

        int lineheight
        Height of each line. Thumbnails will be scaled to this height (minus the border).

      • defaultWidth

        int defaultWidth
        Guesstimate of the width of a thumbnail that hasn't been processed yet.

      • xloc

        int[] xloc
        Array of the x locations of each of the thumbnails. Every 0 stored in this array indicates the start of a new line of thumbnails.

      • anim

        java.lang.Thread anim
        Thread that renders each thumbnail in turn

      • showing

        int showing
        Which thumbnail is selected, or -1 if no thumbnail selected.

      • needdrawn

        int needdrawn
        Which thumbnail needs to be drawn next, or -1 if the previous needy thumbnail is being processed.

      • defaultNotSet

        boolean defaultNotSet
        Whether the default width has been guesstimated for this PDFFile yet.

      • listener

        PageChangeListener listener
        The PageChangeListener that is listening for page changes

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ThumbPanel

        public ThumbPanel(PDFFile file)
        Creates a new ThumbPanel based on a PDFFile. The file may be null. Automatically starts rendering thumbnails for that file.

    • 方法详细资料

      • run

        public void run()
        Renders each of the pages in the PDFFile into a thumbnail. Preferentially works on the needdrawn thumbnail, otherwise, go in order.
        指定者:
        run 在接口中 java.lang.Runnable

      • addPageChangeListener

        public void addPageChangeListener(PageChangeListener pl)
        Adds a PageChangeListener to receive notification of page clicks.

      • removePageChangeListener

        public void removePageChangeListener(PageChangeListener pl)
        Removes a PageChangeListener from the notification list.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops the render thread. Be sure to call this before dropping a ThumbPanel.

      • setDefaultWidth

        public void setDefaultWidth(int width)
        Sets the default width of an un-processed thumbnail.
        参数:
        width - the width of an unknown thumbnail, in pixels.

      • handleClick

        public void handleClick(int x,
               int y)
        Handles a mouse click in the panel. Figures out which page was clicked, and calls showPage.
        参数:
        x - the x coordinate of the mouse click
        y - the y coordinate of the mouse click

      • pageShown

        public void pageShown(int pagenum)
        Sets the currently viewed page, indicates it with a highlight border, and makes sure the thumbnail is visible.

      • showPage

        public void showPage(int pagenum)
        Notifies the listeners that a page has been selected. Performs the notification in the AWT thread. Also highlights the selected page. Does this first so that feedback is immediate.

      • paint

        public void paint(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Updates the positions of the thumbnails, and draws them to the screen.
        覆盖:
        paint 在类中 javax.swing.JComponent

      • imageUpdate

        public boolean imageUpdate(java.awt.Image img,
                  int infoflags,
                  int x,
                  int y,
                  int width,
                  int height)
        Handles notification of any image updates. Not used any more.
        指定者:
        imageUpdate 在接口中 java.awt.image.ImageObserver
        覆盖:
        imageUpdate 在类中 java.awt.Component

      • getPreferredScrollableViewportSize

        public java.awt.Dimension getPreferredScrollableViewportSize()
        指定者:
        getPreferredScrollableViewportSize 在接口中 javax.swing.Scrollable

      • getScrollableBlockIncrement

        public int getScrollableBlockIncrement(java.awt.Rectangle visrect,
                              int orientation,
                              int direction)
        指定者:
        getScrollableBlockIncrement 在接口中 javax.swing.Scrollable

      • getScrollableTracksViewportHeight

        public boolean getScrollableTracksViewportHeight()
        指定者:
        getScrollableTracksViewportHeight 在接口中 javax.swing.Scrollable

      • getScrollableTracksViewportWidth

        public boolean getScrollableTracksViewportWidth()
        指定者:
        getScrollableTracksViewportWidth 在接口中 javax.swing.Scrollable

      • getScrollableUnitIncrement

        public int getScrollableUnitIncrement(java.awt.Rectangle visrect,
                             int orientation,
                             int direction)
        指定者:
        getScrollableUnitIncrement 在接口中 javax.swing.Scrollable
